task.title: Select Employees
task.shortdesc: Employee administrators must select the employees to include in the mass update.

step.cmd: From the Select Employees page, select Add Employees. The Add Employees page appears.
Use the Find By field to search for and find the applicable employees.

info.p: The Search option finds employees within the currently selected component company. Only those employees that the user is qualified to view are displayed for selection.

step.cmd: Check the boxes next to the applicable employees from the list or check the box at the top of the Employee Name column to select all employees listed on the page. Additionally, you can Select All or Deselect All, instead of scrolling through the list.
Select OK. The Select Employees page displays the selected employees.

image.alt: Select employees to apply mass update.

ul.li: When selected employees are assigned to jobs that use pay scales, additional validations are completed to verify the employee administrator has the appropriate web access rights enabled for the Change Job and Salary work event.
When selected employees are in different job groups, options may be limited on the Change Job tab of the work event.
